segments.text: Hi , is this the Resume Writing Workshop ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this is the Resume Writing Workshop . Welcome !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really don ’ t know that much about putting together a resume .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s easy . Don ’ t worry about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ’ s the most important part ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the most important thing we need to do is make sure that our name and contact information are across the top .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can either list your job experience next or your education--whichever is the most impressive should be first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I list my interests next ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , that would be a good place for them .
segments.speaker: S2
